mcode Reference Model Version 1.0.0
shr.core

Element Ingredient

Documentation:

Specifies an material component in a non-medication substance.

Ancestors:
  • Ingredient
Used By:
  • Medication, 
  • Substance

    • Field Summary

      Properties Defined Constraints Value
      SubstanceOrCode

      A code or substance reference identifying the ingredient.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      SubstanceOrCode
      1..1
      IngredientStrength

      Specifies how many (or how much) of the items there are in this Medication. For example, 250 mg per tablet. This is expressed as a ratio where the numerator is 250mg and the denominator is 1 tablet.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      IngredientStrength
      1..1
      IsActiveIngredient

      True if the ingredient is an active ingredient in the medication.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      IsActiveIngredient
      0..1
